title: Vlad Talk ?
body:
how do you feel vlad is at the moment ? 
I find him really fun and late game can bring high damage changing a whole team fight 
do you think he is good for carrying in low elo as well ?

replies.body:
I think vlad works well as a top laner against Melee champions (especially if they don't have a gap closer). He's a great kiter with Rylais, and has awesome sustain with will of the ancients.

He's probably going to be updated a bit mid year, check out this post to see our champion designers thoughts on the champion - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/OJQBsbEM-mid-year-mage-updates-vladimir-direction

Vlad is an amazing low elo champion due to his high lane sustain, in built gank protection through sanguine pool, aoe waveclear/point and click low cd farming, good trading potential and fantastic late game scaling. What more could you want?

source: used vlad amongst others to get out of bronze/silver/gold

Also, in saying that, Vlad's one of those champions at the moment who gets worse the higher elo you go. Assuming you mean Vlad top lane, there are a lot of high elo priority picks for top lane which simply perform better as a champion than he does; fiora and gangplank are two that come to mind that not only have high kill potential in lane but can split push better and are debateably more valuable to a team.

But in lower elo go right ahead fam, he's great to rise a few ranks!

I've not seen a good vlad in a while.

Back in S3 and 4 if I remember correctly he had a lot of play but not a lot in my ELO.
